description:
Grow the bermudagrass lawn you've always wanted

This dual-action kit establishes new grass while keeping weeds away.

Want to grow a lush bermudagrass lawn without fighting weeds at every turn? This kit gives you everything you need with Bermuda Time seed to cover up to 10,000 sq. ft. of common bermudagrass, plus Dandelion Doom herbicide to control broadleaf weeds without harming your new grass. The combination helps you establish a heat-resistant, traffic-tolerant lawn that thrives in sunny southern yards. Remember, this seed is for common bermudagrass lawns only, not hybrid varieties.

At Sunday, we create lawn solutions that work with nature—so you can enjoy your yard and spend less time maintaining it.

sections.whats_included: Common bermudagrass seed and broadleaf weed control in an easy-to-use kit. Includes 2 bags of Bermuda Time seed (covers 10,000 sq. ft.), Dandelion Doom herbicide concentrate (treats 1,500 sq. ft.), plus a battery-operated wand sprayer with herbicide pouch.
sections.instructions:
For best results when establishing or renovating bermudagrass lawns:
Apply Dandelion Doom when temperatures are below 85°F and weeds are actively growing
Allow herbicide to dry completely (at least 24 hours) before seeding
Sow bermudagrass seed uniformly at 1 lb. per 1,000 sq. ft.
Water seeded areas 1-2 times daily to maintain consistent moisture
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What weeds does Dandelion Doom control?
Dandelion Doom effectively targets the most common broadleaf weeds in lawns, including dandelions, clovers, chickweed, thistle, creeping charlie, and more. It also controls moss, algae, and lichens, and suppresses common lawn diseases.
When should I apply grass seed?
Apply bermudagrass seed during the active growth season for warm-season grasses. This is spring into summer when average temps consistently hold between 70-90 degrees F.
What order should I use the products in? What if I apply products out of order?
Start with Dandelion Doom for weed control, followed by seeding with Bermudagrass Grass Seed. Allow 24 hours for herbicides to dry before seeding.
If you seed before using Dandelion Doom, don't worry! Just target weedy areas with Dandelion Doom after seeding and allow weed control to fully dry before watering.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying my kit?
It’s safe to return to the lawn anytime after applying grass seeds. Wait until weed control fully dries before returning to the lawn.
When will I see results?
Dandelion Doom shows effects within a few hours to a day. Bermudagrass seeds germinate (or grow) in 21 days, but may take more or less time pending conditions.
